message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $90.
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $85. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
I understand where you're coming from, Bob! I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer it to you for $87.50. It's a great compromise, and I think you'll really enjoy the product.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $82.50?
I understand your budget constraints, Bob. I'm willing to make another compromise. I can offer it to you for $84.50. It's getting close to your target, and I think it's a fair price for both of us.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm really trying to stick to my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $80?
